entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add dot product intrinsics to AVX10v2 API #110032
  • SseFormatter internal buffer doesn't grow properly and throws #110028
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add CollectionMarshal.AsSpan<T>(ObservableCollection<T>) overload #110024
  • LoggerMessageAttribute and EventID inconsistency with non-code generated logging. #110021
  • Suboptimal codegen with `StartsWith(literal)` #110019
    10.0.0
  • Customizable Uri redaction for HTTP logs and traces #110018
    Future
  • Option to emit `url.template` by built-in SocketsHttpHandler tracing and metrics #110017
    Future
  • Assertion when stepping over breakpoint #110016
  • CultureInfo.TextInfo.IsRightToLeft returns false for Uyghur culture in Blazor WebAssembly #110015
  • "you must install or update .net to run this application" localization or personnalization improvements #110013
  • Allow to Specify HttpClientHandler in IHttpClientFactory #110009
  • ios-arm64 helix queue: Failed to list devices #110008
  • Regression in .NET 9.0.0 causes incorrect behavior of TypeScript Compiler running with Jurassic (System.Reflection.Emit) #110004
  • Failed to AOT compile aot-instances.dll, the AOT compiler exited with code 134 #110003
  • dotnet run error Assert failure(PID 28188 [0x00006e1c], Thread: 26664 [0x6828]) in .net 9 #110000
  • [iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst] String comparer for sorting numeric strings logically #109999
    10.0.0
  • OleDB has crashes and access violation exceptions when using databases in specific versions of 64 bit MSAccess #109995

Closed

  • Setting floating point control work no longer works as expected with new Exception handling in 9.0 #109997
  • Delegate constructor is reported as public by reflection API #110022
  • [API Proposal]: VPCLMULQDQ Intrinsics #95772
    10.0.0
  • [9.0][wasm] error NETSDK1147: To build this project, the following workloads must be installed: wasm-tools #109653
  • [9.0][wasm] Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref with version (= 8.0.11) or (= 6.0.36) #109627
  • Hostfxr Installation Location Path Key May Diverge from Specification #109974
  • Compiler bug in release mode #109606
    8.0.x
  • > Should CA1820 be removed when all these changes defeat its perf improvement reasoning? #99219
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Missing 64-bit CPU intrinsics (e.g. pmovmskb on mm) #110005
  • AccessViolationException sometimes happens in F# compiler #110012
  • [API Proposal]: Mitigate the sources of privacy and compliance issues by providing and using safe-to-log URIs and safe-to-log exceptions #93221
    10.0.0
  • LdapSessionOptions.VerifyServerCertificate Callback Does Not Work in Linux #109952
  • Update PackageValidation (APICompat) baseline version to 9.0.0 in November (.NET 9 GA) #106598
    10.0.0
  • `BenchmarksGame.SpectralNorm_3.RunBench` benchmark is much slower on Linux compared to Windows #13629
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: #110011
  • Hitting assert in NibbleMapDeleteUnlocked #109970
  • mono code line crash my server #110006
  • fail: DevToolsProxy #105881
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] problem with native linking against skiasharp and emscripten 3.1.56 #109289
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT tests which use SkiaSharp needs to be updated when they contain native libs built against newer emscripten #103566
    Future
  • [6.0] [tvOS] Failed to boot Apple TV: Unable to boot the Simulator #86274
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Add formatting support to `System.Net.ServerSentEvents` #109294
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Bound check elimination regression #109365
    10.0.0
  • [Cookie] CookieCollection.GetCookies() does not retrieve cookies prefixed with a "." #18597
  • SocketAsyncEventArgs.ConnectSocket can't be explicitly cleared #30252
  • Few non loopback networking tests fail with 503 - (Server has been shutdown) #30722

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix PooledByteBufferWriter handling of sizeHint <= 0 #110031
    area-System.Net
  • Delete pragma suppression for warning disabled with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #110030
    area-System.Net
  • Adds Linux CMake presets for coreclr #110029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Make contracts tests use mock/placeholder target instead of actual target #110027
    test-enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove some `fgRenumberBlocks` calls #110026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use <sys/ucontext.h> instead of <ucontext.h> #110023
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable cloning of try regions #110020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix handling of IDynamicInterfaceCastable wrt CastCache #110007
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update DynamicallyAccessedMembers annotation on EventSource #110001
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Tests] Add more logging for runtime test timeouts #109998
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #109996
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Remove unsupported _AggressiveAttributeTrimming switch #109994
    needs-area-label
  • Use explicit full-path for loading MsQuic.dll on Windows #109963
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Update resourceManagement.yml #110014
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Run downlevel tests only on main #109919
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Refactor 3-opt utilities to facilitate expansion #109982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch to non-incremental servicing and update ApiCompatNetCoreAppBaselineVersion to 9.0.0 #109790
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow nibblemap deletes to be no-op #109976
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: (x u>> cns) -> [0..(x's max value >> cns)] #109900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Re-enable skiasharp WBT tests #109232
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • Add SseFormatter #109832
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Fix dataflow analysis for GetNestedType #109814
    new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Fix BCE regression #109466
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Unroll more Equals/StartsWith/EndsWith on arm64 #109036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Simplify usage of TestPlaceholderTarget in tests #109873
    test-enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #109988
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Improve containment for widening intrinsics #109474
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add GFNI Intrinsics #109537
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109989
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading
  • Avoid exception when parsing AD path for port number #109977
    bug, area-System.DirectoryServices, regression-from-last-release, 10.0.0
  • Adding CPUID for AVX10.2 #109302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't use a GVM in Linq Select with NAOT by default #109978
    area-System.Linq, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for MacCatalyst/iOS simulator #109928
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, community-contribution
  • Propagate static readonly loads by value during inlining #108579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix length check for Convert.TryToHexString{Lower} #109891
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for generic span casting #109136
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109990
    area-System.Threading
  • fix(wasm): proper library detection for browserwasm and wasi #109866
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • SPMI: Switch back to unpinned 9.0 SDK for micro benchmarks #109992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
  • Add configuration variables. #109907
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109646
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, 9.0.x
  • Don't log from property accessors in the ILLink task. #109948
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix IDynamicInterfaceCastable with shared generic code #109918
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • JIT: implied Boolean range assertions for local prop #109481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use reaching definitions in CSE to update conservative VNs #109959
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Ensure proper cleanup of key files when not persisting them #109844
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure proper cleanup of key files when not persisting them #109845
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • Rework HttpClient content buffering #109642
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Unhandled exception handler. #109806
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Add option GCTrimYoungestDividerValue to tune gen0 trim divider #109863
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add numerical ordering option for string comparison operations #109861
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • More WriteGather fixes #109826
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • Small clean up in assertionprop for relops #109987
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64-SVE: Fix up comments in optimizemaskconversions #109955
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Non-PGO calli/delegate call transformation #109679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • threads.h: Fix up grammar/spelling in vm/threads.h #109972
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix hostfxr.h to be valid C again. #109763
    area-Host, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Swift Binding] Ensuring referential transparency and NativeAOT compatibility #2794

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] CI Linux machine running low on memory #2700
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement RhGetCommonStubAddress ? #2735
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Compile minimum wasm file size #2789

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove PS download on Linux #2795
  • [SwiftBindings] SwiftHandle #2793

Merged

  • [SwiftBindings] Document generic methods #2771
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Use `DebugType=none` instead of `NativeDebugSymbols=false` #2791
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Exclude src/docs from CI #2792
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Automate `WasmDebugging.csproj` via LLDB scripting #2785
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add WasmExternalDwarf property to create an external_debug_info section #2786
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [SwiftBindings] Binding process doc #2779
    area-SwiftBindings
  • Interpreter design docs #2774
    area-CoreclrInterpreter
  • [RuntimeAsync] Add support for async struct instance methods (potential implementation 1) #2790
    area-async

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0079 incorrectly reported when AnalysisLevel is set to latest-all #44993
  • publishsinglefile causes runtime failure of hostpolicy.dll not found for dotnet 9.0.100 #44992
  • dotnet test command does not respect case of --configuration when using --artifacts-path #44991
  • Regression in .NET Framework Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.Binder.Convert for dynamic type #44979

Closed

  • Microsoft.NET.Publish.Tests.dll.5 is timing out a lot, imbalance with other partitions #44895

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove AspNET substraction logic #44995
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Increment branding to allow for post-GA hotfixes #44994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44990
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow nuget-client test binaries #44989
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [StaticWebAssets] Detects pre-compressed assets #44976
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44806
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add .npmrc to prevent npmjs usage, even accidentally #44986
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Write APICompat suppressions when baseline suppressions aren't empty #44965
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Split GivenThatWeWantToRunILLink test class into multiple so Helix can run them separately #44973
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Remove 6 from the branch codeflow #44829
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workaround for MSBuildProjectLoader.LoadProjectInfoAsync throwing on unrecognized project language #44927
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Apply xunit configuration to all tests for better test failure diagnostics #44907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • format: stop checking for dotnet cli version #44958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2585928 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Signing in Repos that Override Build Actions #44855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build installers on Windows in aspnetcore. #44828
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Javiercn/replace swa globbing #44159
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Run all steps in a container #44969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: CLI Help missing package description #44954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable tests following the net10 transition #44931
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP - Add fantomas formatting support #44801
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • upgraded logging for #595 log url when connection is closed #44953
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Nullable Reference Types in Test Projects #44862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Factor Hot Reload agent implementation into a source package #44899
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Replace 'Property' with method` erases DIM #75999
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent nullable warning behavior involving the null-forgiving operator on the left-hand-side #75997
  • Incorrect warning that Deconstruct method is unused. #75995
    Backlog
  • Fix `Implement abstract class` generates invalid code when target type has no body and is followed by file-scoped type #75992
    Backlog
  • Fix `Add import` is not suggested for extension methods defined in projects targeting a different framework than the project using the extension method #75991
    17.13
  • OverloadResolutionPriority is not respected on some attribute constructors #75985
    17.13

Closed

  • Action `Convert to tuple` on anonymous object does not remove trailing comma #75950
    Backlog
  • MemberNotNullWhen is ignored with static methods #75949
  • Improved async value retrieval #75942
  • light #75990
  • Visual Studio 2022 Community - Open in Terminal #75989
  • MSBuild.UnitTests should target `$(NetRoslyn)` instead of `$(NetVS)` #75498
    17.13 P2
  • [API Proposal]: Preprocessing symbol APIs #66510
    Backlog
  • Find all references for preprocessor symbol does not yield any results #66009
    Backlog
  • "Inline temporary variable" introduces an unnecessary cast that's reported as nullability issue #60552
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35519.47 #75983

PullRequests

Created

  • Use VisitRvalue to visit a function pointer #75996
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [backport] Update structured logger #75994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #75993
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • VB Overload Resolution Priority - handle operators and respect language version #75941
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • [backport] Workaround failing official builds #75998
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update language feature status #75962
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Remove trailing comma when converting to a tuple #75987
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [backport] Postpone respecting the code-style analysis config rule until NET10 #75984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Null-conditional assignment 1 #75821
    Area-Compilers, VSCode, New Feature - Null Conditional Assignment, 17.13 P2
  • Fix TFM of MSBuild.UnitTests #75969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • Tweaks to inline variable and nullable #75966
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Postpone respecting the code-style analysis config rule until NET10 #75978
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Do not pay attention to Overload Resolution Priority for properties assigned in attributes #75958
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Prefer array to ReadOnlySpan over Span #75853
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types, 17.13 P2
  • Check for BackingField instead of IsAutoProperty in NullableWalker #75872
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add fixer to convert from bound generic types in nameof to unbound types. #75976
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix switch indentation for list patterns #75953
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: single_query #59080
  • Update QuickGrid, Fix the issue when rendering empty rows, so that they don't render styled #59078
  • Add `ExceptionHandlerOptions.SuppressLoggingOnHandledException` #59075
    10.0-preview1
  • dotnet user-jwts fails to parse tokens it creates #59073
  • Cookie Domain not working #59070
  • Setting RuntimeFrameworkVersion of Blazor project and building with .net 9 SDK installed fails to create blazor.boot.json file #59069

Closed

  • Generate a competent Project Lead model that will solve the naming and documentation issues. #58969
  • AddOpenIdConnect not properly parsing Token Claims from OIDC Providers #58989
  • Stop embedding JS files in Endpoints and Server assemblies #58783
    10.0-preview1
  • [Templates] Local build failures because of workloads #58957
  • net9 - Build a RCL fails if multiple files with same name but different extensions are under wwwroot #58859
    9.0.x
  • Block is backed by disposed slab #24557
    6.0-preview3
  • OpenAPI: OperationId not set when EndpointName attribute is not available #59053
  • Best place to store SQLite database file for Blazor app running on Azure App Service? #59028
  • Blazor hybrid template with Tailwind #59040
  • Perf improvement: updates #59061
  • Default Authentication Scheme Not Honored with JwtBearerDefaults.AuthenticationScheme in .NET 8.0 #58906
  • ARC App Service cannot authenticate to AAD #42631
    .NET 10 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Harden parsing of [Range] attribute values #59077
    area-mvc, 9.0.x
  • Add option to exception handler middleware to not log error #59074
    area-networking

Merged

  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Revert "Pass -sign and -publish switch to dotnet build only" #59082
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Re-enable local development job #59079
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Harden parsing of [Range] attribute values #59043
    area-mvc
  • Pass -sign and -publish switch to dotnet build only #59068
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine ServerShutsDownGracefullyWhenMaxRequestBufferSizeExceeded #59066
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Build installers at the end of the repo build #58987
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android Publishing Gets Stuck on Archiving #26004
  • .NET 9 GA BlazorWebView not rendering on ARM64 Windows Desktop #26003
  • Unable to custom the MAUI Android Talkback configuration in the keyboard #26002
  • System.InvalidCastException when using a custom map handler on iOS and .NET 9. #26000
  • Conflicting assets with the same target path '_framework/blazor.modules.json' when building 2nd dependency MAUI Blazor class libraries #25999
  • Installing MAUI workload on M1 MacBook Pro gets stuck. #25998
  • [Android .Net 9.0] Maui Hybrid input onkeydown not working anymore #25996
  • [Windows] Opening the flyout menu result in a binding failure #25995
  • CollectionView ItemsUpdatingScrollMode got to top of list #25994
  • [Windows] - CarouselView reverts to displaying 1st item in collection when collection modified #25991
  • Why don't .NET MAUI 9 C# compiled bindings support source-generated properties? #25988
  • Href on an image on Android doesn't work #25985
  • Grid: Not getting invalidated when changing the Height/Width of Row/ColumnDefinitions declared with the short syntax #25983
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Grid: Provide information for the actual height of RowDefinition and actual width of ColumnDefinition #25982
    .NET 10 Planning
  • FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory returns different path after updating to latest version #25981
  • Dynamic resource value is not applied for the property #25978
  • Double tapping Editor control locks app when deployed to iPad. #25975
  • Editor vertical text alignment not working after toggling IsVisible #25973

Closed

  • Button on a CollectionView's EmptyView is not clickable on Windows #21935
    Backlog
  • MAUI Splash screen does not take full screen size Xiaomi device #23878
  • Activity client record must not be null to execute transaction item #23939
  • Hamburger menu remains visible in Android while Shell.FlyoutBehavior is set to Disabled #25959
  • Images are not showing on Android - MAUI 9.0.0 #25843
  • Extend KeyboardAccelerator to all controls #16936
    Backlog
  • Documentation: Contradictory workload versions #25454
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [ci] Fix arcade signing new fonts on dancing #25987
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Issue with .NET MAUI Microsoft.Maui.Controls 9.0 Update. Error (CS0246) #25835
  • XAML Data Binding Error - Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #25819
    .NET 9 SR2
  • When a FCM notification is received, the application activates the "App Class" even when the application is closed #19030
  • [Android, .NET MAUI 9.0 Preview 5] When building with Visual Studio 17.11.0 Preview 2.1, Maui fails randomly to import the fonts, but still finishes building without errors. #23364

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #26001
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Updated the Blazor Hybrid Solution template to work better with the dotnet cli or IDEs that rely on it. #25997
    area-blazor, area-templates, community ✨
  • Add options for specifying a minimum workload version requirement #25993
  • Add fallback to ContentPresenter Content binding using reflection #25992
    area-xaml
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 15 #25990
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 14 #25989
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Adding an UITest to validate Editor width using a custom style from PlatformView #25980
    area-testing
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.6.1 to 1.6.3 #25977
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨

Merged

  • [ci] Enable provisionator with variable or devdiv #25966
    area-infrastructure, area-testing, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [Testing] Changes in randomly failing UITests #25914
    area-testing
  • [ci] Fix signing fonts , add public pipeline #25986
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [XC] fix compiled bindings containing arrays #25949
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.1 to 1.0.2 #25969
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.1 to 1.0.2 #25925
    area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1

Updated

  • Border.Shadow hide the collectionView Header/footer - fix #25960
    community ✨
  • [ci] Bump branding for sr2 #25915
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment is off #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 SR2
  • Use newer default backup rules for android #24391
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials
  • [net9.0] Enable back the failing Shell tests #22830
    area-controls-shell, area-testing, testing-reenable
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 5 #25772
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix RadioButton using ContentPresenter not rendering #25947
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-radiobutton, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 13 #25954
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation when layout updates #25662
    area-layout, area-controls-button
  • Fix OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25552
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix android image loading race condition and improve logging #25870
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix disabled WebView Cookie Tests #24978
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] Fix FlyoutPage ShouldShowToolbarButton when overridden to return false, still shows button in title bar #25857
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨
  • Fixed [iOS] Fix CarouselViewRemoveAt so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25919
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Gradient never returns to the correct color - fix #25910
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for Editor scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25691
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 12 #25917
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865

  • [Windows] Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2792.45` to `1.0.2903.40` #24329
    area-infrastructure, community ✨
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titleview
  • made FilterQuality configurable for Resizetizer #25686

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • whats the replacement for ColumnExpression.Table in v9? #35165
  • ExecuteUpdate on Nullable stop working after migration from 8 to 9 #35164
  • Feature Request: Adding Support for Tuples in DbContext.Database.SqlQuery<T>() #35163
  • Regression from EF Core 8 to 9: MigrationBuilder.DropTable Causes Issues with Subsequent Table Recreation #35162
  • InvalidCastException When Reading Property with Inconsistent Column Types Across Multiple Databases #35161
  • get names by referance instead of hardcoding #35160
  • How do we manage the order of updates when using a filtered unique index? #35159
  • PendingModelChangesWarning exception thrown when upgrading to .NET 9 #35158
  • Running dotnet-ef migrations bundle in a Azure pipeline #35157
  • Strange gradual perf regression on ParentVariations benchmark #35156
  • Perf regression in QueryCompilationSqliteTests|FilterOrderProject #35155
  • Perf regressions in query benchmarks #35154
  • Perf regressions in ChildVariations|AutoDetectChanges = False #35153
  • EF9: Unexpected unbound variable error with closure #35152

Closed

  • "The operands for operator 'Equal' do not match the parameters of method 'op_Equality'." while using in ?? COALESCE in Where #35150

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix contains test #35166

Merged

  • Don't remove the annotation in NonNullableConventionBase #35151
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 8.0.10 to 9.0.0 #35140
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
